basics.name: Andrew Lisowski
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: I'm a Front End Engineer with a passion for sweating the details. Building good UI is easy, building great UI is hard. I love the challenge of creating interfaces that are both beautiful and functional for a wide range of users.

work.summary: Implemented a new design system and component library to completely redesign the app, modernized the codebase into a proper monorepo, helped bring the electron app to the web, and implemented an E2E testing framework on top of playwright.
work.name: Descript

work.summary: Interned on 3 different product teams, getting hired on full time in 2016 to work on a client rendering library and a design system. That eventually led to my team being leaders in the design systems and front end tooling space at the company, eventually leading to me becoming the "Open Source Leader" for the San Diego office.
work.name: Intuit - TurboTax
